item.title: 供应下降缓解紧张情绪，长债突然重新流行起来
item.description: 随着投资者关注供应变化，并在大跌后寻找便宜货，全球长期债券的压力正在减轻。【原文：Pressure on long-dated bonds is easing around the world as investors eye supply changes and hunt for bargains after a selloff.】

item.title: 印尼 "大胆 "干预，印尼盾走软创纪录
item.description: 印度尼西亚中央银行表示，在印尼盾跌至历史最低点之际，该行正在 "大胆 "干预金融市场，以稳定印尼盾。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank said it is intervening “boldly” in financial markets to stabilize the rupiah as the currency falls toward a record low.】

item.title: 黑客攻击活动已入侵美国政府的思科设备
item.description: 据一位高级联邦官员称，黑客入侵了美国联邦政府内部的防火墙设备。【原文：Hackers compromised firewall devices within the US federal government, according to a senior federal official.】

item.title: S.韩国总统李明博称朝鲜拥有足以维持生存的核武器
item.description: 韩国总统李在明（Lee Jae Myung）表示，朝鲜已经获得了足以保证政权生存的核武器，并且即将完成能够打到美国的洲际弹道导弹技术。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said North Korea has already secured sufficient nuclear weapons to guarantee regime survival, and is nearing completion of intercontinental ballistic missile technology capable of reaching the US.】

item.title: 受风险厌恶情绪和 ETF 资金流入影响，黄金有望实现第六周上涨
item.description: 受地缘政治紧张局势加剧、资金流入金银支持的交易所交易基金以及更广泛市场的风险厌恶情绪的支撑，黄金交易价格略低于创纪录水平，有望实现第六周上涨。【原文：Gold traded just below a record — on track for a sixth weekly gain — supported by elevated geopolitical tensions, inflows into bullion-backed exchange-traded funds, and a risk-off tone in broader markets.】

item.title: 印度打击期权交易，150 年历史的交易所意外获胜
item.description: 监管机构对印度期权市场的打击正在推动 BSE Ltd. 的市场份额增长，帮助它挑战一家规模更大的交易所竞争对手的主导地位。【原文：A regulatory crackdown on India’s options market is fueling market share gains for BSE Ltd., helping it to challenge the dominance of a larger exchange rival.】

item.title: 金田公司出售价值 11 亿澳元的 Northern Star 股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，金田有限公司以 11 亿澳元（约合 7.25 亿美元）的价格出售了同为矿业公司的北极星资源有限公司的股份。【原文：Gold Fields Ltd. sold a stake in fellow miner Northern Star Resources Ltd. for A$1.1 billion ($725 million), according to people familiar with the matter, asking not to be identified to discuss private information.】

item.title: YouTube 争取将康卡斯特的 Peacock 纳入付费电视捆绑计划
item.description: 如果两家公司不能在 9 月 30 日前达成新的分销协议，YouTube TV 用户可能会失去康卡斯特公司旗下 NBCUniversal 网络的节目，包括周日的 NFL 比赛。【原文：YouTube TV subscribers may lose programming from Comcast Corp.’s NBCUniversal networks, including Sunday NFL games, if the companies can’t reach a new distribution agreement by Sept. 30.】

item.title: 中国最大的金融科技公司用人工智能管理公司资金
item.description:
这家由马云支持的公司正利用其庞大的数据库和人工智能工程专长，大力进军被忽视但利润丰厚的全球现金管理领域。【原文：

The Jack Ma-backed company is using its vast data trove and AI engineering expertise to muscle into the overlooked yet lucrative world of global cash management.

】

item.title: 超级周期 "可能延长韩国芯片制造商的千亿美元涨势
item.description: 随着人工智能热潮向科技界不那么令人兴奋的角落蔓延，韩国两家最大的芯片制造商本月市值增长超过 1,000 亿美元的迅猛涨势有望继续。【原文：The blistering rally that has added more than $100 billion in market value to South Korea’s two largest chipmakers this month is seen continuing, as the artificial intelligence boom spreads to less exciting corners of the tech world.】

item.title: 分析师称，外汇波动缓和提升了新兴市场套利交易的吸引力
item.description: 瑞穗证券公司（Mizuho Securities Co.）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Easing currency volatility is giving fresh support to emerging-market carry trades by reducing risk, according to analysts at Mizuho Securities Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 东京 CPI 意外保持稳定，支持日本央行的谨慎态度
item.description: 由于临时因素的影响，东京的消费通胀出乎意料地保持稳定，这一数据支持了日本央行对提高基准利率的谨慎态度。【原文：Consumer inflation in Tokyo unexpectedly held steady as a result of temporary factors, in data backing the Bank of Japan’s cautious approach to raising its benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: 俄罗斯压力加剧，石油将迎来一周大涨
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普为结束乌克兰战争而加大对俄罗斯能源买家的压力，石油创下三个多月来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：Oil headed for its biggest weekly gain in more than three months as US President Donald Trump increased pressure on buyers of Russian energy in a bid to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 摩根大通加入美国科技 ETF 浪潮，以满足蓬勃发展的亚洲需求
item.description: 从纽约到首尔，资产管理公司都在争相推出产品，以满足亚洲散户投资者对美国科技股看似永不满足的需求。【原文：Asset managers from New York to Seoul are scrambling to launch products to meet the seemingly insatiable demand for US technology stocks from Asia’s retail investors.】

item.title: 美国调查华锐公司逃避太阳能关税的行为
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的一份公告，美国海关和边境保护局正在调查Waaree Energies Ltd.和Waaree Solar Americas Inc.是否逃避对来自中国和其他东南亚国家的太阳能电池征收反倾销和反补贴税。【原文：The US Customs and Border Protection is investigating whether Waaree Energies Ltd. and Waaree Solar Americas Inc. evaded anti-dumping and countervailing duties on solar cells from China and other Southeast Asian nations, according to a public notice obtained by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 劳工组织称富士康工人在赶制 iPhone 17 期间面临艰苦条件
item.description: 据中国劳工观察（China Labor Watch）的一份报告称，中国工厂的工人在争分夺秒地准备苹果公司新推出的 iPhone 17 系列产品时，遭遇了艰苦的条件。【原文：Chinese factory workers suffered difficult conditions while racing to get Apple Inc.’s new iPhone 17 lineup ready, according to a report from China Labor Watch.】

item.title: 中国租赁商正与北京谈判缓解美国港口费压力
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，至少有两家中国大型银行的租赁子公司正在与金融监管机构商谈将航运租赁转为抵押贷款，以防范美国的征税，他们认为这将考验中国的海运主导地位。【原文：The leasing subsidiaries of at least two large Chinese banks are in talks with the financial regulator about converting shipping leases into mortgages as a safeguard against US levies they say will test China’s maritime dominance, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国将对重型卡车和厨柜征收关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布针对重型卡车、厨房橱柜和浴室柜以及软垫家具征收新的特定行业关税，扩大了旨在通过提高进口税扶持国内产业的贸易议程。【原文：President Donald Trump announced new industry-specific tariffs targeting heavy trucks, kitchen cabinets and bathroom vanities, as well as upholstered furniture, expanding a trade agenda aimed at bolstering domestic industries by hiking import taxes.】

item.title: 美国 GDP 为利率前景蒙上阴影，亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于美国经济数据好于预期，美联储未来降息的前景蒙上阴影，亚洲股市准备跟随华尔街走低。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to follow Wall Street lower as better-than-forecast US economic data clouded the outlook for future Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: KKR 首席执行官押注日本老龄化将推动人工智能和科技投资
item.description: KKR & Co.表示，日本的人口老龄化为投资利用人工智能和其他技术的领域提供了机会，以充分利用日益减少的劳动力。【原文：KKR & Co. says Japan’s aging population presents opportunities to invest in areas that tap artificial intelligence and other technologies to make the most of a shrinking workforce.】

item.title: 中美贸易赌注刺激澳大利亚矿业公司创 2015 年以来最佳季度业绩
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司林纳斯稀土有限公司（Lynas Rare Earths Ltd.）有望创下近十年来最强劲的季度市场涨幅，因为投资者押注该公司将成为中美贸易紧张局势升级的主要受益者。【原文：Australian miner Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. is on track to post its strongest quarter of market gains in nearly a decade as investors bet on its role as a key beneficiary of escalating US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 安必帕尔公司正在洽谈聘请债务谈判顾问事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西废物管理公司 Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA 正在与 Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton 律师事务所就债务重组委托进行深入谈判。【原文：Brazilian waste-management company Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA is in advanced talks with law firm Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton for a debt restructuring mandate, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: First Brands 准备匆忙破产，却未制定任何计划
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，汽车零部件供应商 First Brands Group LLC 正准备在没有重组计划的情况下进入破产程序，这表明该公司的命运正在迅速瓦解。【原文：Auto-part supplier First Brands Group LLC is preparing to enter bankruptcy with no restructuring plan in place, a sign of how quickly the company’s fortunes are unraveling, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 与谷歌有关联的加密货币矿商计划为数据中心举债 30 亿美元
item.description: TeraWulf Inc.的财务总监帕特里克-弗勒里（Patrick Fleury）表示，预计该公司将通过谷歌公司支持的结构筹集约30亿美元，以支持其数据中心的建设。【原文：TeraWulf Inc. is expected to raise approximately $3 billion to support the build-out of its data centers via a structure supported by Google Inc., according to Patrick Fleury, the crypto miner’s finance chief.】

item.title: 为什么苹果公司仍未攻克人工智能？
item.description:
该公司长期以来一直是消费类小工具之王。《布隆伯格原创》展示了该公司在人工智能方面的缺陷如何使其面临风险。【原文：

The company has long been the king of consumer gadgets. Bloomberg Originals shows how its shortcomings in artificial intelligence could put that at risk.

】

item.title: 流动性枯竭，美联储银行储备降至 3 万亿美元以下
item.description: 作为美联储决定继续缩减资产负债表的一个关键因素，美国银行系统的储备金连续第七周下滑至 3 万亿美元以下，原因是流动性继续从金融体系中流失。【原文：The US banking system’s reserves, a key factor in the Federal Reserve’s decision to keep shrinking its balance sheet, tumbled for the seventh straight week to below $3 trillion as liquidity continues to drain from the financial system.】

item.title: 英特尔投资者抢购看涨期权，追逐疯狂涨势
item.description: 随着英特尔公司寻求更多合作，投资者纷纷押注英特尔公司，认为这家芯片制造商在获得美国政府、英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Investors are piling into bullish bets on Intel Corp., betting that a weeks-long rally following a string of investments from the US government, Nvidia Corp. and others will continue as the chipmaker seeks further tie-ups.】

item.title: 特朗普签署 TikTok 法案，美国应用程序价值达 140 亿美元
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推进了美国投资者从中国所有者字节跳动有限公司手中收购 TikTok 美国业务的计划，官员们设定了 140 亿美元的潜在价值，并概述了确保新企业安全的措施。【原文：President Donald Trump advanced plans for American investors to buy TikTok’s US operations from its Chinese owner ByteDance Ltd., with officials setting a potential value of $14 billion and outlining measures to ensure security of the new venture.】

item.title: 白宫阿根廷救援计划背后的原因
item.description:
在今天的 "Big Take "播客中：美国总统特朗普和美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特表示计划提振阿根廷经济。【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: President Trump and US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent have signaled plans to boost Argentina’s economy.

】

item.title: Ares Aims 筹集 80 亿美元支持人工智能推动的数据中心发展
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp. ）为数据中心投资设定了筹款目标，希望从流入这一蓬勃发展行业的数百万美元新费用中分得一杯羹。【原文：Ares Management Corp. has set fundraising targets for data center investments, positioning itself to capture a share of the millions of dollars in new fees flowing into the booming sector.】
